================================================================================
                        KNOUX PLAYER Xâ„¢
    Professional Desktop Media Player & Audio/Video Workstation
================================================================================
Version       : 1.0.0
Platform      : Windows | macOS | Linux
Architecture  : Electron + React + TypeScript + C++
Author        : SADEK ELGAZAR (KNOUX)
Device        : Knoux7-Core
Status        : Production Ready
License       : Proprietary
Project Size  : 325.5 MB
Total Files   : 500+
================================================================================
```

---

## ğŸ“‹ Executive Summary

**KNOUX Player Xâ„¢** is a next-generation professional-grade desktop media player that combines **cinematic video playback**, **hi-fi audio processing**, and **AI-powered subtitle intelligence** in one elegant, neon-themed interface. Built on Electron with native C++ engines for performance-critical operations, it delivers studio-quality playback while maintaining cross-platform compatibility.

---

## ğŸ¯ Core Mission

> "To empower creators, audiophiles, and media enthusiasts with a unified, intelligent media workstation that respects quality, embraces AI, and delivers a mesmerizing user experience through neon-futuristic design."

---

## âœ¨ Key Features

### ğŸ¬ **Advanced Video Engine**
- **Formats**: MP4, MKV, AVI, MOV, WMV, FLV, WebM, M4V
- **Codecs**: H.264, H.265/HEVC, VP9, AV1, MPEG-4
- **Resolution**: Up to 8K UHD (7680Ã—4320)
- **HDR Support**: HDR10, Dolby Vision, HLG
- **Hardware Acceleration**: NVIDIA NVDEC, AMD VCE, Intel Quick Sync
- **Deinterlacing**: Advanced motion-adaptive algorithms
- **Color Grading**: Real-time LUT application & custom filters

### ğŸµ **Hi-Fi Audio Processing**
- **Formats**: MP3, FLAC, WAV, AAC, OGG, ALAC, DSD
- **Output**: 32-bit/384kHz high-resolution
- **Exclusive Mode**: WASAPI (Windows) / CoreAudio (macOS)
- **10-Band Parametric EQ**: Custom curves with presets
- **Audio Effects**:
  - Reverb, Echo, Chorus
  - Bass Boost, Surround Sound
  - Volume Normalization
  - Dynamic Range Compression
- **Channel Mixer**: Custom routing and balance
- **Gapless Playback**: Seamless transitions
- **Crossfade**: Adjustable fade duration

### ğŸ§  **AI-Powered Intelligence**
- **Subtitle Timing Engine**: Auto-sync subtitles to audio
- **Emotion-Based Coloring**: Dynamic subtitle colors based on mood
- **Dialogue Clarity**: AI-enhanced vocal separation
- **Scene Mood Detection**: Automatic theme/lighting adaptation
- **Content Analysis**: Smart tagging and categorization
- **Gemini AI Integration**: Natural language queries

### ğŸ“œ **Advanced Subtitle System**
- **Formats**: SRT, ASS/SSA, SUB, VTT, PGS
- **Rendering**: Hardware-accelerated with effects
- **Styling**: Full typographic control (fonts, colors, shadows)
- **Arabic RTL Support**: Proper right-to-left rendering
- **Search & Download**: Built-in subtitle database
- **Multi-Language**: Display multiple tracks simultaneously
- **Karaoke Mode**: Synchronized word highlighting

### ğŸ¨ **Neon-Futuristic UI**
- **Glassmorphism**: Translucent, layered panels
- **Neon Accents**: Vibrant glows (Cyan, Purple, Pink)
- **Hexagonal Design**: Signature geometric patterns
- **Particle Effects**: Dynamic background animations
- **Dark Theme**: Eye-friendly cinematic mode
- **Responsive**: Adapts to any screen size
- **Mini Mode**: Floating compact player

### ğŸ“ **Library Management**
- **Smart Scanning**: Auto-detect media folders
- **Metadata Extraction**: ID3, EXIF, Matroska tags
- **Artwork**: Embedded & external (local/online)
- **Database**: SQLite with full-text search
- **Collections**: Albums, Artists, Genres, Years
- **Duplicate Detection**: Find and merge

### ğŸ§ **Playlist Intelligence**
- **Dynamic Playlists**: Auto-updating criteria
- **Smart Shuffle**: Weighted randomization
- **History**: Recently played tracking
- **Favorites**: Quick-access bookmarks
- **Queue Management**: Drag-drop reordering
- **Import/Export**: M3U, M3U8, PLS, XSPF

### ğŸ”Œ **Plugin System**
- **SDK**: Full TypeScript API
- **Sandboxed**: Secure execution environment
- **Hot-Reload**: Develop without restart
- **Registry**: Community marketplace
- **Types**:
  - Audio/Video processors
  - UI components
  - Subtitle engines
  - Format decoders

### ğŸŒ **Integration & Control**
- **Discord Rich Presence**: Show now-playing
- **Media Keys**: Hardware button support
- **Web Remote**: Control via browser
- **REST API**: Automation & scripting
- **Keyboard Shortcuts**: Fully customizable
- **CLI**: Command-line interface

---

## ğŸ—ï¸ Technical Architecture

### **Native Modules (C++)**
```cpp
// core/engine/media_engine.cpp
class MediaEngine {
    AudioDecoder* audioDecoder;
    VideoDecoder* videoDecoder;
    DSPProcessor* dspProcessor;
    
    void processAudioFrame(AudioFrame* frame);
    void processVideoFrame(VideoFrame* frame);
    void applyColorGrading(VideoFrame* frame, LUT* lut);
};

// core/system/logging.cpp
class Logger {
    void info(const std::string& msg);
    void error(const std::string& msg);
    void performance(const std::string& metric, double value);
};
```

### **Audio Processing Pipeline**
```
Input â†’ Decoder â†’ DSP â†’ Equalizer â†’ Volume â†’ Output
         â†“        â†“       â†“          â†“         â†“
      FFmpeg   Native   10-Band   Controller WASAPI/
               C++      Filters              CoreAudio
```

### **Video Rendering Pipeline**
```
Input â†’ Decoder â†’ Deinterlace â†’ Color Grade â†’ Filters â†’ Render
         â†“          â†“              â†“            â†“         â†“
      Hardware   Motion        LUT/Shader   Effects   GPU
      Accel     Adaptive                             Canvas
```

## ğŸ¨ Neon Design System

### **Color Palette**
```scss
// Primary Neon Colors
$neon-cyan:    #00f0ff;
$neon-purple:  #a855f7;
$neon-pink:    #ec4899;
$neon-green:   #10b981;
$neon-orange:  #f59e0b;

// Dark Background
$bg-primary:   #0a0e1a;
$bg-secondary: #111827;
$bg-tertiary:  #1f2937;

// Glass Effects
$glass-bg:     rgba(17, 24, 39, 0.7);
$glass-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
$glass-blur:   20px;
```

### **Typography**
```scss
// NeonTech Font Family
@font-face {
  font-family: 'NeonTech';
  src: url('/fonts/NeonTech-Regular.woff2');
}

// Hierarchy
h1: NeonTech Bold, 48px, neon glow
h2: NeonTech Medium, 32px
h3: NeonTech Regular, 24px
body: Inter, 16px
mono: NeonTechMono, 14px
```

### **Key Components**
```typescript
// NeonButton.tsx
<NeonButton 
  variant="primary|secondary|ghost"
  size="sm|md|lg"
  neonColor="cyan|purple|pink"
  onClick={handler}
>
  Click Me
</NeonButton>

// NeonPanel.tsx
<NeonPanel 
  glass={true}
  glow={true}
  hexagonCorners={true}
>
  Content
</NeonPanel>
```

## ğŸ”§ Development

### **Prerequisites**
```bash
Node.js  >= 18.0.0
npm      >= 9.0.0
Python   >= 3.8 (for native modules)
C++      >= 17 compiler
FFmpeg   >= 5.0
```

### **Setup**
```bash
# Clone & install
git clone https://github.com/knoux/knoux-player-x.git
cd knoux-player-x
npm install

# Start development
npm start

# Build production
npm run package

# Run tests
npm test
```

### **Scripts**
```json
{
  "start": "electron-forge start",
  "package": "electron-forge package",
  "make": "electron-forge make",
  "lint": "eslint --ext .ts,.tsx .",
  "test": "jest",
  "test:e2e": "playwright test"
}
```

## ğŸ¯ Key Features Implementation

### **1. Audio Equalizer**
```typescript
// src/core/audio/EqualizerEngine.ts
export class EqualizerEngine {
  private bands: EqualizerBand[];
  private audioContext: AudioContext;
  
  constructor() {
    this.bands = this.create10BandEQ();
  }
  
  private create10BandEQ(): EqualizerBand[] {
    const frequencies = [32, 64, 125, 250, 500, 1000, 2000, 4000, 8000, 16000];
    return frequencies.map(freq => ({
      frequency: freq,
      gain: 0,
      q: 1.0,
      filter: this.audioContext.createBiquadFilter()
    }));
  }
  
  applyPreset(name: string): void {
    const preset = presets[name];
    this.bands.forEach((band, i) => {
      band.gain = preset.gains[i];
      band.filter.gain.value = preset.gains[i];
    });
  }
}
```

### **2. Subtitle AI Sync**
```typescript
// src/core/subtitle/AITimingEngine.ts
export class AITimingEngine {
  async syncSubtitle(
    audioTrack: AudioTrack,
    subtitle: Subtitle
  ): Promise<Subtitle> {
    const audioFeatures = await this.extractAudioFeatures(audioTrack);
    const dialogueTiming = await this.detectDialogue(audioFeatures);
    
    return this.alignSubtitle(subtitle, dialogueTiming);
  }
  
  private async detectDialogue(features: AudioFeatures): Promise<DialogueTiming[]> {
    // ML-based dialogue detection
    const model = await tf.loadLayersModel('/models/dialogue_detector');
    const predictions = model.predict(features.spectogram);
    return this.extractTiming(predictions);
  }
}
```
